alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:58AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Chemung, central Tioga and southeastern Tompkins Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 557 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencer, or 10 miles west of Owego, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark Valley, Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Lockwood, South Danby, Willseyville, North Spencer, Speedville and West Newark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
